H0.text: Which was the first year in which the football World Cup final was broadcast on television in colour. 1962

H1.text: Which was the first year in which the football World Cup final was broadcast on television in colour. 1966

H2.text: Which was the first year in which the football World Cup final was broadcast on television in colour. 1958

H3.text: Which was the first year in which the football World Cup final was broadcast on television in colour. 1970

A4.text: The final, which was broadcast locally by the BBC, was the last to be shown entirely in black and white.

A5.text: In 1978, the FIFA World Cup was broadcast in color using PAL-B in Argentina.

A6.text: In 1978, the FIFA World Cup was broadcast in color using NTSC in Chile.
